  Huang Wei Jen (Hong Hoi) is disgruntled because his boss, Ku Lung Tung (Ku Feng), does not give him a chance to be promoted. His wife, Ma Ya Lin (Ai Ti) encourages to resign and proposes that he write an abusive letter which would incite the boss to sack him, thus giving him a monthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pay in lieu of notice.
 The day after they posted the letter to Ku but before it reaches him,Huang is informed that he is being promoted to manager at the new office in the U.S.A. Huang and his wife begin racking their brains to retrieve the letter.
 In their panic, they try various ways to achieve this but instead of success they get involved with the police instead.
